label: Yacht and Boat Industry
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to yacht and boat sales, rentals, charters, and services.
intents: Buy or rent a yacht or boat
Learn about yacht or boat design and courses

subcategories.label: Yacht Sales
subcategories.description: Sales of new and used yachts and boats.

subcategories.label: Yacht Rentals and Charters
subcategories.description: Rentals and charters of yachts and boats for leisure or business purposes.

subcategories.label: Yacht and Boat Services
subcategories.description: Services related to yacht and boat maintenance, repair, and customization.

subcategories.label: Yacht and Boat Jobs
subcategories.description: Job opportunities in the yacht and boat industry.

subcategories.label: Yacht and Boat Design and Courses
subcategories.description: Design and courses related to yacht and boat building and maintenance.
